entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 40%
